Enjoy.

want its recipients to know that what they have is not the original, so

You may charge a fee for the physical act of transferring a copy, and

Thus, it is not the intent of this section to claim rights or contest

In addition, mere aggregation of another work not based on the Program

item.title: Some Information on #452
item.dc:creator: @Krichevskoy Krichevskoy
item.description:
@Krichevskoy wrote:

ruler:

Accoring to the GPL souce must accompany all distributions. However GPL can not be applied to classes that extend jagex’s.

I think you’re thinking about the LGPL (Library/Lesser General Public License). It does not require that you release source to works derivative of or dependent on the copyrighted material, just the source of the original copyright - it was created to make library development feasible under an open license. While I haven’t looked at the fine print in some time, I believe the full GPL stipulates a source release of any derivative works. Neither license excludes original code based on (derivative of, dependent on) closed source.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Information on #452
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

[quote=“ruler, post:16, topic:67637”][quote author=ownagesbot link=topic=98886.msg1013469#msg1013469 date=1173931561]
Nah, hes not a ruler, he’d just like a reward for his work… I mea HIS work not rulers rips. Persides a java updater > ibot anyday.leet, id donate but ive got no money and I dont need it anyways (I dont play RS and my bot does what I need (which is nout tbh)) anywayssssss ppl u shud donate to pplz hes leet and he deserves it
[/quote]
I can’t make everyone happy. The only licenses i have broken are Jagex, i havn’t broken that license in almost a year. Aryan rune never distributed source. 2 months into selling aryan updates, i stopped distributing some botclass sources, i did this with permission from pd. I did this as a reaction to SilbaSoft who was a leading staff member of this forum, cracked Slave Bot’s auth system just by editing the source. Accoring to the GPL souce must accompany all distributions. However GPL can not be applied to classes that extend jagex’s.[/quote]

Blah blah blah…

Read full topic

item.title: Some Information on #452
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:

item.title: Some Information on #452
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Lot of use you guys are…

getChatStatePublic() added to class "client" gets static field "ff.int a" getChatStatePrivate() added to class "client" gets static field "cc.int u" getChatStateRequest() added to class "client" gets static field "ff.int a"

Thanks for not pointing out the chat state updater was flawed. I read beyond it’s ordinary context on accident.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 14, 2007, 02:39:02 AM[/size][hr]getPassword() added to class "client" gets static field "i.rd l" getUsername() added to class "client" gets static field "i.rd y"

On another note, does anyone else notice how both of these fields always seem to appear in the same class?

Weird, huh. Because they are static, and if ZKM was what scrambled this, it would DEFINITELY not happen like this sooo anyone got some inkling or suspicion they’d like to share?
